value.string:
self = context
 kw = {}
 
 # This script has proxy role to access Assignments here
 assignment_list = self.contentValues(portal_type='Assignment')
 calendar_uid_list = []
 for assignment in assignment_list:
 calendar_uid_list.extend(assignment.getCalendarUidList())
 node = [self.getUid()] + calendar_uid_list
 
 default_source = context.getRelativeUrl()
 
 portal_simulation = self.portal_simulation
 
 portal_type = []
 resource = None
 src__ = 0
 
 # if (from_date is None) or (to_date is None):
 # zoom_level=context.REQUEST.get('zoom_level', '30')
 # from_date, to_date = self.planning_validate_date_list(DateTime(), zoom_level)
 
 # Calculate portal_type
 if portal_type == []:
 portal_type = self.getPortalCalendarPeriodTypeList()
 
 simulation_state = self.getPortalCurrentInventoryStateList() + \
 self.getPortalTransitInventoryStateList() + \
 self.getPortalReservedInventoryStateList()
 
 movement_list = context.portal_simulation.getMovementHistoryList(
 node_uid=node,
 portal_type=portal_type,
 simulation_state=simulation_state, 
 to_date=to_date, 
 from_date=from_date,
 sort_on = (('stock.date', 'ascending'),),
 omit_mirror_date=0,
 )
 
 result_list = []
 
 date_list = [DateTime('1007/03/01'), DateTime('1007/03/01')]
 quantity_list = [-1]
 
 def flush_list():
 start_date = date_list[0]
 for k in range(1, len(date_list)):
 stop_date = date_list[k]
 quantity = quantity_list[k-1]
 if quantity > 0 and start_date < stop_date:
 
 mov = mvt_list[k-1].asContext(
 start_date = start_date,
 stop_date = stop_date,
 )
 mov.edit(source = default_source)
 result_list.append(mov)
 start_date = stop_date
 
 
 for movement in movement_list:
 default_range = movement.stop_date - movement.start_date
 next_start_date = movement.date
 if next_start_date <= movement.start_date:
 next_stop_date = movement.stop_date
 else:
 next_stop_date = movement.date+default_range
 next_quantity = movement.total_quantity
 next_relative_url = movement.relative_url
 
 if next_start_date >= date_list[-1]:
 flush_list()
 date_list = [next_start_date, next_stop_date]
 quantity_list = [next_quantity]
 mvt_list = [movement]
 else:
 
 i = 0
 len_date_list = len(date_list)
 while i < len_date_list:
 current_date = date_list[i]
 if next_start_date < current_date:
 break
 i += 1
 j = i
 while j < len_date_list:
 current_date = date_list[j]
 if next_stop_date < current_date:
 break
 j += 1
 
 # Insert new quantities
 if i == 0:
 new_quantity_list = [next_quantity]
 new_mvt_list = [movement]
 else:
 new_quantity_list = quantity_list[:i]
 new_mvt_list = mvt_list[:i]
 
 if i == j:
 if (next_quantity <= 0) or (quantity_list[i-1] <= 0):
 new_quantity_list.append(-1)
 else:
 new_quantity_list.append(1)
 new_mvt_list.append(movement)
 else:
 for k in range(max(i, 1), min(j, len_date_list-1)+1):
 if (next_quantity <= 0) or (quantity_list[k-1] <= 0):
 new_quantity_list.append(-1)
 else:
 new_quantity_list.append(1)
 new_mvt_list.append(mvt_list[k-1])
 
 if j < len_date_list:
 new_quantity_list.extend(quantity_list[j-1:])
 new_mvt_list.extend(mvt_list[j-1:])
 else:
 new_quantity_list.append(next_quantity)
 new_mvt_list.append(movement)
 
 quantity_list = new_quantity_list
 mvt_list = new_mvt_list
 date_list.insert(j, next_stop_date)
 date_list.insert(i, next_start_date)
 
 flush_list()
 
 return result_list
